sections.summary:
Accounting professional with twenty years of experience in inventory and manufacturing accounting. Ability to fill in at a moment's notice, quickly
mastering new systems, processes and workflows. Take charge attitude, ability to work independently, recommend and implement ideas and
process improvements.
